home.title: Affiliations
home.forHelpTroubleshooting: For help troubleshooting, please contact the Member Portal Team and copy/paste or include a screenshot of the error message below.

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete this affiliation for {{ email }}?
delete.note: This affiliation will also be deleted from the user's ORCID record.
delete.noteRevoked: This affiliation will be deleted from the Member Portal but will remain in ORCID. The user has revoked access to their ORCID record and you no longer have permission to delete this item from their ORCID record.
delete.error: Sorry, this affiliation could not be deleted.
delete.userRevokedAccess: The user has revoked access to their ORCID record and you no longer have permission to edit or delete this item in ORCID.

import.title: Import affiliations
import.label: Please select a CSV file to upload

errors.label: Oops! There was a problem processing your data. Pleases fix the errors below and try again

assertionServiceAssertion.updateNote: Note: Please do not forget to download and send permission links to your researcher once the assertion has been saved.
assertionServiceAssertion.uploadNote: Note: Please do not forget to download and send permission links to your researchers once the upload has completed.
